name: travelingcircusofurbanism
description: Urban narratives and practices, collected through travel
author: Mariko Sugita & Jasper Stephenson

scripts.deploysite: git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages
scripts.golive: git pull && npm run pushlocalchanges && npm run generate && npm run deploysite && npm run cleanup
scripts.pushlocalchanges: npm run cleanup && git add . && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Auto-pushing files" && git push
